https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yjjrgylUyDdY1i1gzAwshVh3wlQ.jpg A cop Angel Almaraz saves the life of a local crime boss who, in return, offers him a job as part of his security. Almaraz accepts but soon has doubts. Bad Cop
